type: Repair of a Collins DME-4000 DME component
short_summary: Transports Canada (TC) requires the repair of a Collins DME - 4000 DME by the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM).li>li>li>The period of the Contract is from date of Contract award to December 31st, 2022, inclusive.
description: Requirement for the repair of a Collins DME-4000 DME component.
